question: When did Limoges receive the label "City of Art and History"?
asked_question_translated: Wanneer kreeg Limoges het label "Stad van Kunst en Geschiedenis"?
answer: Limoges kreeg het label "Stad van Kunst en Geschiedenis" in 2008.
answer_translated_eng: Limoges was labelled "City of Art and History" in 2008.
